channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Exchange Server
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Exchange Server

item.title: CVE-2019-0586|2024-08-04T17:51:26.861Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists in Microsoft Exchange software when the software fails to properly handle objects in memory, aka "Microsoft Exchange Memory Corruption Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Exchange Server.

item.title: CVE-2019-0858|2024-08-04T17:58:59.835Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists in Microsoft Exchange Server when Outlook Web Access (OWA) fails to properly handle web requests, aka 'Microsoft Exchange Spoofing Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-0817.

item.title: CVE-2019-0588|2024-08-04T17:51:27.068Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists when the Microsoft Exchange PowerShell API grants calendar contributors more view permissions than intended, aka "Microsoft Exchange Information Disclosure Vulnerability." This affects Microsoft Exchange Server.

item.title: CVE-2019-0817|2024-08-04T17:58:59.015Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20exchange%20server
item.description: A spoofing vulnerability exists in Microsoft Exchange Server when Outlook Web Access (OWA) fails to properly handle web requests, aka 'Microsoft Exchange Spoofing Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-0858.
